mapper.select: select id,recordNo,userid,auditor,auditDate,status,sort from tbl_leave_audit_record WHERE disable = '0' and status = '0' and auditor = #{userId} ORDER BY auditDate DESC
select recordNo,auditor,sort,status from tbl_leave_audit_record where disable = '0' and recordNo = #{recordNo} and sort = #{sort}

select a.recordNo,a.status,a.sort,a.auditor,a.auditDate,b.user_name as username,b.image,a.userid,a.reason from tbl_leave_audit_record a left join tbl_users b on a.auditor = b.user_id where recordNo = #{recordNo} order by a.sort
select recordNo,auditor,sort,status from tbl_leave_audit_record where auditor = #{userId} and status <> '0' order by id desc limit #{pageNum},#{pageSize}
